response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, valued at $1,200,000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits that align perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Considering its immense value and the unique benefits it provides, we are extending this extraordinary offer to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to own a piece of excellence that is not only a significant investment but also a testament to your discerning taste and success. We believe that this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for both parties, allowing us to share the value of this product while ensuring you receive it at a highly favorable price. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let us know, and we will proceed with the necessary arrangements promptly. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a distinguished owner of our premium product.", "product_price": 1100000}
